p: The results of the Fidelity Level for the 10 most cited medicinal plants showed that the highest values were for Eucalyptus spp. (FL 90.47%) for respiratory conditions followed by Matricaria recutita (85.55%) and Mentha pulegium (84.09%) for digestive problems treatment and, Valeriana officinalis (76.38%) for insomnia (TableÂ 5).
